mapper.insert: INSERT INTO withdraw_user (name, pwd, email, tel, gender, birthday, nickname, intro, profile_img, instagram_id, point, report_cnt, user_code, reg_date, created_by, updated_by) VALUES (#{name}, #{pwd}, #{email}, #{tel}, #{gender}, #{birthday}, #{nickname}, #{intro}, #{profileImg}, #{instagramId}, #{point}, #{reportCnt}, #{userCode}, #{createdAt}, #{createdBy}, #{updatedBy})
